statement.p: Coral reefs throughout the world are dying at a rate of about 1 per year. Write an equation that can be used to determine the future area of a reef that now has an area of 150 \displaystyle{k}{m}^{{2}}. Let \displaystyle{c} be the area of the coral reef in \displaystyle{t} years from now.

ol.li:
The equation is in the
linear
quadratic
exponential
family

li.p: Use the equation to determine how many years until the reef decays to an area of 117 \displaystyle{k}{m}^{{2}}? Round to the nearest year.
